drupalNodeEvent.title: China Now Music Festival: China and Beethoven, "Beethoven in Beijing: an Orchestra's Journey"

field_organizers.processed: US-China Music Institute, History Making Productions, Philadelphia Orchestra, Wharton School

field_description.processed: Get early access to the new documentary "Beethoven in Beijing," which follows the Philadelphia Orchestra on their first historic trip to China in 1973 and chronicles the opening of China to Western classical music since the end of the Cultural Revolution. In collaboration with History Making Productions, the Wharton School, and the Philadelphia Orchestra.
